meanings.sent1: She was overwary of strangers, always checking her surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The overwary cat hesitated before approaching the new toy.
meanings.sent3: The overwary squirrel kept peeking out from behind the tree, afraid of the falling acorns.
meanings.sent4: His overwary behavior made him miss out on many fun opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The overwary student triple-checked her answers before handing in the test.

meanings.definition: Showing too much caution or suspicion.
meanings.sent1: The overwary driver refused to go over the speed limit, even on an empty road.
meanings.sent2: Being overwary of the email, she decided not to click on the suspicious link.
meanings.sent3: The overwary detective suspected everyone, even the innocent bystanders.
meanings.sent4: Her overwary nature made her question every compliment she received.
meanings.sent5: The overwary shopper carefully examined each item before making a purchase.
